}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "R626Pg_V3D_20070906" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC manual contains a block diagram of the device, but :the information seems to conflict with the internal photos. *[[Star]] STR9105GU @200MHz (ARM9) *8MB Flash, 64MB RAM noted *[[Ralink]] RT2661 module noted instead of RT2561S *[[Realtek]] RTL8305SC noted as the switch ... :[[IC+]] IP175C (??) switch clearly visible in the photos.
See also [[E-TOP PR126g]]..
[[Category:English Documentation]]
